trait.name: Clurichaun's Luck
text: Clurichauns add both their Dexterity and Charisma modifiers to their Armor Class.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The clurichaun's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The clurichaun can cast the following spells, requiring only alcohol as a component.
At will: friends, mending, minor illusion, purify food and drink, vicious mockery
1/day each: blur, calm emotions, heroism, sleep, suggestion

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The clurichaun has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Improvised Weapon
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, depending on weapon.
